definition: everything is fine (idiom); all is well with the world
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
if the family lives in harmony all affairs will prosper (idiom)
lit. everything is ready, all we need is an east wind (idiom)/fig. lacking only one tiny crucial item
pinyin: wan4 shi4 ju4 bei4 , zhi3 qian4 dong1 feng1

definition: Mazda Motor Corporation/also known as 馬自達|马自达
everything is ready, all we need is an east wind (idiom)/lacking only one tiny crucial item/also written 萬事俱備，只欠東風|万事俱备，只欠东风
pinyin: wan4 shi4 jie1 bei4 , zhi3 qian4 dong1 feng1

definition: the first step is the hardest (idiom)
every beginning is difficult (idiom)/getting started is always the hardest part

sentences.english: I wish you all the very best for the new year ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我祝你們在新的一年萬事如意。

sentences.english: You have everything you need to become what you are capable of becoming.
sentences.chinese: 萬事俱備，你已經可以成爲你能夠成爲的那個人了。

sentences.english: Did God create everything that exists?
sentences.chinese: 萬事萬物都是上帝創造的嗎？

sentences.english: If the ruler appoints virtuous men of experience and age, myriad affairs will be well managed.
sentences.chinese: 君主信任年高德助的老臣，萬事都能治好。

sentences.english: To conclude, I wish you every success in your work, happiness for you and your families, and good luck in everything.
sentences.chinese: 最後，祝大家工作順利，闔家幸福，萬事如意。

sentences.english: I can't do everything all at once —you'll have to be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我不能萬事一把抓呀，你可急不得。

sentences.english: Once-flowing water has flow, everything is by the East.
sentences.chinese: 昔時流水至今流，萬事皆逐東流去。

sentences.english: Just get a cool tool and we're set".
sentences.chinese: 只要找到一個酷酷的工具就萬事大吉了”。

sentences.english: May the New Year bring you health, happiness and all other good things.
sentences.chinese: 祝您新春快樂，身體健康，萬事如意。

sentences.english: Health so that everything can become.
Believe that together we can do anything.
sentences.chinese: 相信團隊合作可以萬事皆成。

sentences.english: I bless her everythings all fine!
Get your packages installed, your classpath set up, and you'll be ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 安裝好工具包並設置正確的類路徑，就萬事俱備了。

sentences.english: If you see the clock, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 如果看到時鐘，則萬事大吉了。

sentences.english: In this fast-changing global world, everything is moving.
sentences.chinese: 在當今飛速變化的全球，萬事都在變化。

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
chance/opportunity/predestined relationship/(Buddhist) principal and secondary causes/chain of cause and effect
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
the four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
to reincarnate/reincarnation (Buddhism)/(of the seasons etc) to follow each other cyclically/cycle/CL:個|个[ge4]
to fulfill one's desire/to find sth satisfactory
